titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: A fine day, & warmer suggesting spring's advent at last. I attended both Mattins & Evensong in the Cathedral: walked round the wood with Logic, and wrote a number of letters.
stayed till the afternoon, & then took his departure.
drove him & the Professor to Belmont for tea.
